page.title: 06NOW AND THEN
page.content:
Where I live down Broughton Road there are two old women, who have lived in Skipton for all of their lives. One is 92 year old & the other is 83.
They live at 10, Greenfield street and descrbed to me what old Skipton was like: {In their time, back in the 1920's, {the street that they live in was {called Greenfield Avenue. All the {other streets around were built when {the Rose Hewitt Mill was first built. {A lot of labourers found themselves {living there. Ings School was built in {1910. Ruth Green, the younger of the {two sisters, actually went to Ings {School. There were no shops around {Broughton road during that time, so {they had to go to Swadford street to {do their shopping. Cont.
